LittleDog::LegInfo Struct Reference

#include <littledog.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Information about a single leg.

Description:
Each leg has information about the joints that comprise the leg as well as information about the ground contact force sensor included in the lower leg.

 Default constructor.
